MemoryInfobox.description: A merchant in Mytilene was commisioned to craft a Crafted Bear Fur Armor|breastplate using bear skins, and hired Kassandra to gather the skins needed.

General_Description: '''Shroud of the Bear''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met a [[merchant]] who needed [[bear]] skins to craft a [[Crafted Bear Fur Armor|breastplate]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra found a merchant in [[Mytilene]] looking for a [[mercenary]].
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Brave misthios! I'm in need of a brave misthios!''
Kassandra approached him.
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Do you have fear in your heart?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should cut out yours just for asking.''
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Ha! I have a lucrative job offer—a dangerous one, too. If you had fear in your heart, you might not be fit for the task at hand.''

<tabber>
|-|I fear no one.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Nobody scares me.''
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Ah... but I'm not talking about a person. I'm talking about the most dangerous an unpredictable creatures alive... bears.''
|-|We all fear something.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Fear is natural - it helps us survive.''
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Ah. But survival is never guaranteed when facing bears!''

</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What do you want with them?''
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''I need skins to make some breastplates. The best come from [[Chios|Chios island]], north of [[Chios (city)|Chios city]]. I'll make one for you too, if you get them for me.''
(Accept – I'll do it.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll get the bear skins for you.''
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Excellent. If you survive, I'll reward you with the finest breastplate ever created.''
(If players choose "Where are the bears located?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''These bears. Where can I find them?''
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''In the [[Hunted Forest of Artemis]], north of Chios city.''
(Leave – I've heard enough about bears.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have the feeling you could talk about bears all day. I'll return when I have the skins.''
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Do hurry. I've got paying customers waiting for breastplates made from those skins.''
Kassandra left the merchant.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll need to sail to Chios island to get the bear skins.''
Kassandra departed [[Lesbos]] and sailed to Chios, approaching the forests mentioned by the merchant. After killing and skinning a bear, she commented on its texture.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The merchant was right! It's the softest fur I've ever felt.''
After skinning four.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll see if the merchant can make me an entire outfit out of these soft skins.''
Kassandra continued and skinned 2 more bears.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's all of the skins. It's time to sail back to Mytilene and collect my breastplate.''
Kassandra sailed back to the merchant in Mytilene.
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Do you have the skins?''

<tabber>
|-|You can have my skins.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have your bear skins.''
*'''Street Vendor:''' ''Most impressive! Not many people have faced the majestic bear and lived to tell the tale... It's only fitting you receive a breastplate for your bravery.''
|-|I'm keeping my skins.=
* '''Kassandra:''' ''I’m not ready to part with these skins.''
* '''Street Vendor:''' ''Gorgeous ones like that- I can understand. But I’m in desperate need of skins of my own.  Would you get more for me?''
* '''Kassandra:''' ''I’ll think about it.''
* '''Street Vendor:''' ''Come back if you ever want to sell them.''
The quest will not be completed until Kassandra agrees to give the bear skins; talking to the merchant again will yield the same dialogue.
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the merchant to recover bear skins needed to craft breastplates.
